title: Vertex AI - Forecast with the Timeseries Insights API
abstract:
# Vertex AI - Forecast with the Timeseries Insights API
The Timeseries Insights API is a fully-managed solution, integrated with Google Cloud services. You can create datasets with tens of billions of events, and query the dataset thousands of times per second.
For details, see the [Timeseries Insights API documentation](/timeseries-insights/docs/overview) .
content:
## Train a Tabular forecasting model
As another forecasting option, you can build your own model to forecast based on structured time series data using Vertex AI Tabular forecasting.
For more information, see [Tabular forecasting](/vertex-ai/docs/tabular-data/forecasting/overview) .
